Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge and the New York Yankees will see Miles Mikolas starting for the St. Louis Cardinals in the final game of a three-game series.
The Yankees have a 3.76 team ERA that ranks sixth among all MLB pitching staffs.
Cardinals pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.16 ERA this year, which ranks 18th in MLB.
The game is scheduled for Sunday, September 1, 2024, at 1:35 p.m. ET at Yankee Stadium.
The Yankees are favored with odds of -207, while the Cardinals are underdogs with odds of +171.
